phrases: Mocademy Visual Effects Awards...
Shinobu Morita!
Bonsoir, madames et messieurs.
Who the hell?!
I mean, is that Morita-san?!
nakushita yakusoku wa hoshi ni
Send the lost promises to the stars
omoide wa tokenai
My memories will not fade away
yotsuba no clover sagashinagara kimi no kao
I steal a glance at you as we look for four-leaf clovers,
chirari nusumi mite wa me o sorasu
But then divert my eyes
yasashii ame wa furu watashitachi no ue ni
The gentle rain falls above our heads
surechigau hito no kazu dake dramatic ni naru no
as it becomes as dramatic as the number of people passing by
kowareta taisetsu na mono to
I wonder if we will ever be able to
itsuka mata aeru hi ga kurukashira
reunite with those precious things that were broken
nokoshita kizuato ga kienai
The scars that were left behind will not go away
sorezore no basho made
Now we must depart
mou ikanakucha
To our own separate ways
W-W-What is that man doing?
He is on T-TV!
And the Mocademy Awards?!
Hollywood!
Visual Effects Award?
What?
So that means that Morita-san did the CG?
He is blonde!
No way!
I do not know!
What is going on?
What is the meaning of this?
What?
What is going on?
What is it?
I cannot believe it.
We have not seen him in a year!
Please be quiet!
You are causing trouble for the other patients!
And we finally see him again - on TV!
And it is the Mocademy Awards!
O-Oh, I am sorry.
Everyone, quiet down!
He is blonde...
Mocademy Visual Effects Award!
E-Everyone, be quiet, his speech is starting!
Um, wow, what should I talk about?
I got put up to this at such short notice, and I am not good with speeches...
Then, since I am bad at this, I will say simply.
First, a message to the man who, in the middle of everything, dumped it all on me, from the character designs and CG action...
To background effects and the motion capture models, saying to me, I will leave everything to your talents.
And when poor little me tried to go back to Japan saying, This was not in my contract, so I am leaving...
And in the end, saying, We are not going to make it in time for the premiere,
Eventually telling me so amiably, Actually, we need them by tomorrow...
And what the hell is As feeling!
supposed to mean?
When I bitterly (yet honestly) complained that, I cannot draw anything without model sheets,
I mean, this was the screenplay.
What I wanted was the model sheets!
On top of that, the latter part of it was blank...
Hey, Shinobu, what do you think will happen for the ending?
So I was like, Whatever, and answered, I am sleepy, and he goes ahead and uses it!
I mean, if he is going that far, is not it like half the screenplay was done by me?
This is not simple at all!
I want to say, Fork over my half of your damned box office revenue!
Not only that, but the man then hurried off on a vacation, saying I will leave the rest to you, and is actually absent today.
To the director, Peter Lucas...
Hey!
M-Morita-san... why do you always do whatever you feel like doing, no matter where you go?
Let go of me!
I still have other things I need to say to him!
I will dedicate every last bit of my 400 million fee to hiring a lawyer and I will come back to this place!
Next time I see you will be in court!
I will pry away at least five times the attorney fee from you!
I will be back!
I have never seen anyone I know on TV before!
Takemoto-san, please be quiet in the hospital room!
Amazing!
I mean, would you normally act that way?
I am sorry, I am sorry, ah...
He is blonde!
I mean, he was never normal to begin with, but...!
He is coming back.
Morita-san is...
America?
When is he coming back?
Who knows?
Maybe in half a year?
Half a year?
Do you want him to come back?
Or do you not?
I do not want him to come back.
I think it is good to keep trying until you have tried everything you have wanted to do.
I wonder what she will do once Morita-san comes back...
And for me...
Nurse...
W-Water...
H-Huh?
Did I make it to heaven before I knew it?
The familiar faces of my classmates are all there like a kaleidoscope...
M-M-M-M-Morita-san?!
Mayama!
It seems he has a light concussion.
Please head over to outpatient care.
Well, who is next?
I am sorry, we are leaving now.
H-Hagu, we are leaving!
I will see you tomorrow, Takemoto-kun!
Huh?
Uh... e-everyone!
Today's Morning Plaza.
First, let us start with this astonishing news.
Receives the Mocademy Award
A Japanese Delightfully Wins
A mysterious Japanese man received the Mocademy Visual Effects Awards.
The recipient, Morita Shinobu-san, criticized the director in his speech...
And the situation deteriorated to the point where he had to be pulled off the stage by bodyguards.
This news is also all over the front pages of American newspapers...
Good morning.
Ouch... why does my neck hurt?
And the citizens are wondering if this was a challenge by Japan directed at their country.
Hey, this is amazing.
The newspapers and TV have his story all over them.
Japanese Wins
And
Melees
At this rate, TV stations might be rushing into our school...
That guy at the hospital last night... that was Morita-san, right?
Why would he be in the hospital?
Or rather, how did he get back to Japan so quickly?
The stuff on TV last night was apparently pre-recorded.
Could it be that Morita-san rushed back to submit his graduate thesis?
I hope that is the case, but who can tell...
Oh, but is not the deadline 5 P.M. today?
Either way, let us go to the hospital one more time.
Now eat a lot and get healthy, Takemoto-kun.
Oh, good morning, everyone.
He is here after all!
Morita-san!
Are you all right?!
Are you sick or something?
Why are you in the hospital?!
He is not blonde!
He overate.
Are YOU sick?
N-No!
M-Morita-san, you are all right now, right?
In that case, we will go home for today, Takemoto-kun.
H-H-Hagu, let us go.
I wanted to take care of my precious Takemoto...
Morita-san, you brought back your payment in cash?
Bag: majison (Madison Square Garden)
Let us close the bag... the wads of bills are popping out...
He just overate...
Not to mention, on the honey-roasted in-flight snack...
Well, they are pretty tasty...
These are great!
What the heck are these?
Just because the in-flight food is free...
This is my shirt!
And I was thinking I had not seen it in a while!
So it was you!
Oh, this?
Kaoru sent it to me.
Since he asked me on the phone if there was anything I needed.
Yeah, here it is.
Are you okay with something like this?
Hurry up and send it over!
I do not have any change of clothes!
But why my shirt?!
On top of that, he broke into my room?
That aside, I need to go buy more honey-roasted peanuts...
What day is today?
C-Curried rice day?
Note: Many Japanese families have a day of the week when curried rice is served.
Let me go!
Well, I was not expecting anything out of you, but...
Seriously...
I have been captured!
Help me, Mayama!
We do not have time.
Let us go, Hagu!
O-Okay.
Actually, Sensei is trying to save you right now.
But it really does not feel like it is been a year.
He has not changed at all...
In fact, he is gotten worse as a human being.
Can you actually make a graduate thesis in just four hours?
Beats me.
But I think he just wants to take him there.
To the person who is been waiting for Morita-san.
So...
Are you going to work?
After I buy a book on historical material in Shinjuku.
What about you, Yamada?
I need to go look after the store now.
So we will go part of the way together.
Yeah.
Oh, actually, there is a book that I wanted as well.
Maybe I will go with you.
I see.
Can I go with you?
Sure.
If you do not mind, do you want to go get lunch together also?
What about looking after your store?
It is fine, my big brother is there.
Many words came to my mind...
But they all seemed too unnatural and embarrassing.
I could not even bring them to my lips.
So I just absent-mindedly watched the brown hair that I like so much turn transparent in the winter sunlight.
Hey, Mayama.
Yeah?
How is your current job?
Well, I guess it is going okay.
Is it just going to be the two of you?
Are not you hiring other people?
Getting more workers brings other problems.
So I think we will just do what the two of us can do for a while.
I see...
I asked that one myself.
But I was surprised by how much my heart stung from Mayama saying, The two of us.
That is why...
I see, that sounds like fun.
S-Sorry.
I-I should... um... get going to the store.
Bye now!
Good luck!
I was getting frustrated for feeling so saddened by just those words.
And I could not stop the mounting frustration at myself for venting that frustration on Mayama...
There is only twenty minutes left until the deadline for submitting your graduate thesis.
I am sure that even you are not capable of finishing this in twenty minutes, Morita.
Gramps...
That is not it, Gramps.
This is my graduate thesis.
Sorry for making you wait for so long.
But I can finally turn it in to you.
Will you accept it, Gramps?
Gramps...
The Mocademy Awards, huh?
You have certainly done it again.
Splendid.
However, I will not accept it!
CG?
Hmph!
Everyone is getting so cocky these days.
I do not know how wonderful of an award it is...
But as long as you are a student in the sculpture department...
I will not accept anything but a sculpture.
Listen.
Out of the thousands of students that I have taught, you were number one or two in terms of talent.
You are like a rose blooming in a forest.
However, Morita, although roses are beautiful, it is truly difficult to maintain them.
They get infested with insects, plagued with infections, and hurt both themselves and those around them with their thorns.
A lifeless rose cannot outshine a healthy dandelion in its beauty.
Gosh, Gramps, you are so snooty.
You are tickling me, telling me that I am beautiful like a rose...
I am telling you that a person with an enormous amount of talent must put in an equally enormous amount of effort lest he fail!
Morita, I have been in love from the bottom of my heart with your talents.
This is the last thing I can do for you as your teacher.
I will teach you, my precious student, about the reality of life!
I will not accept anything for your graduate thesis other than a completed sculpture piece!
That is my farewell gift to you!
Let us... see...
Then, here!
He is not listening to a word I am saying.
Like I said, I will not accept anything but...!
Gramps.
Take a closer look.
H-Handmade...
Moreover, the entire thing is made of pure gold...
Gramps!
Professor Tange!
Accepted
Morita Shinobu
will be graduating...
And now...
Now that this year's graduate thesises have all been accepted...
All the professors who have gathered here today...
For the future of all our students...
Cheers...!
All right!
There it is!
Professors!
It is spilling, it is spilling!
The legendary Cross Counter Toast!
This is good luck!
C-C-Congratulations...
Oh, dear, what a waste...
On top of that, they finished it off German-style!
Thank you, Professor!
I can graduate without any regrets now!
Is not German-style like this...?
German-style (Image)
Prost!
*They have not even taken a sip.
My, Hanamoto-kun, we have finally been able to make it to this day again this year.
I was able to have my students' graduate thesises successfully accepted again.
It really takes the weight off your shoulders, does not it?
But we will be teaching another set of students again soon enough.
Well...
And now, I am sure that Professor Tange can return to a relaxing life as a teacher.
Is the light too bright, Gramps?
You might want this over your face.
Hey, Morita!
You cannot put that over his face.
No!
No cloth!
Morita-san...
Takemoto-kun!
Hagu-chan.
Um, Hagu-chan.
Oh, no, it is nothing.
Cheers!
Yeah.
Cheers.
Let me down, Morita.
I can walk on my own.
Do not overexert yourself, Gramps.
Gramps, you have gotten so light...
You must have gone through a lot of hardship while I was not around.
No, you are the one that made him lose weight...
Over the course of eight years.
We might say this and that, but Morita-san really likes Professor Tange, does not he?
Morita's affection is a double-edged sword, after all.
Gramps, you know...
You yelled at me and hit me a lot, but the past eight years have been a lot of fun.
Be quiet, do not talk so much.
My head hurts.
Just get a move on.
kousha no ura no hosoi michi wa sono mama puuru ni tsuzuiteita
The narrow path behind the school led to the pool.
Okay, Gramps.
Hey, Hanamoto-kun.
natsu no mizu no iro to tomo ni kimi no kioku mo toonoite iku
Along with the summer color of the water, my memories of you are fading away.
Being a teacher really is not that great.
No matter how much you care for a student, they all eventually graduate.
Once they graduate, who knows how many years pass until you see them again.
If things do not go right, you might never see them again.
ano higaerimichi de kimi to musunda yakusoku wa...
Even today, I still have not been able to fulfill
I wonder if teachers are like those school ghosts who cannot even graduate?
Do not you think so, Hanamoto-kun?
i am about to mo soshite kore kara mo hatasenai kara
That promise I made with you on the way home...
itsuka nakushite shimau yo...
At this rate, I will forget it someday...
You sure say some nasty things, Professor Tange...
kimi wa wasurenain darou yurusenai yo ne
But you will not forget, right?
It is unforgivable, right?
Okay, I will take Gramps home.
Morita-san, do not push yourself too hard.
dakara nando mo furikaetta
So I kept looking back.
Your payload will suddenly gain weight like Konaki-jijii once you pass the one kilometer mark.
If you do not watch out, you will see hell tomorrow!
What payload?
Am I Konaki-jijii?!
Mayama, you idiot-idiot-idiot-idiot-idiot!
Ayu, your underwear is showing!
Do not push yourself too hard, Morita!
If you get tired, use a taxi!
kudaranai koto de muki ni natte yubikiri de waratta kimi no kao
Getting upset over stupid things, you smiled as we pinky swore.
And so, another one of our precious senpais headed off...
Gracefully wiping up the numerous memories and sorrows for the parting with a V-sign.
chiisana kaban ni tsumeta mono wa kekkyoku boku no yume bakari
Though, in the end, only my dreams were stuffed into that small bag.
And then...
Hey, want to join the Cinema Society?
Do you like movies?
YOU-Um...
Hagu-chan.
natsu no mizu no naka kara toutou kimi wa agaru koto wa naku...
In the end, you never came out of that summer water.
Oh, how about you?
Would you be interested in the Cinema Society?
Oh, I am sorry.
We are seniors, so we are busy with our graduate thesis and job hunt.
Huh?
She is our senpai?
dare mo inai puuru de boku wa matteru
Alone by the pool, I wait for you.
It is finally just the two of us.
Yeah, I am looking forward to the next year.
kimi to yakusoku shita kara
Because I promised you.
Well, well, do not worry.
I will not let you two be alone.
ie ni kaerou to suru to shibuki ga agari
When I try to go home, there is a splash...
Ever.
Hagu-chan, the ceramics room underwent a revamp.
Ayu!
Oh, yeah.
There is an art festival in Yokohama next week.
boku wa sono ashi wo tomerunda
And it stops me in my tracks.
And while we are there, do you all want to go to the Chinatown there?
Oh, that sounds good!
Huh?
What is it, Takemoto?
Well, I was thinking... that things have not really changed.
I guess I was relieved.
You idiot.
Why would you dislike change at your age?
I-I am sorry.
Well, it is true that you get shocked if things take a sudden turn.
But that is also refreshing, if you think about it.
Is that so?
Pretty much.
Hey!
Hey!
Hey!
Hey!
Wait up!
Mo-Mo-Mo-Morita-san?!
I am Morita Shinobu.
I just entered the Japanese Arts department this spring.
Oh, to be precise, I transferred in as a third year.
So I am a third year already.
But I finally learned after jumping out into the wide world.
Kanji on the heads: stone .
That I still have not studied enough.
E-Even after you were here for eight years?!
Simply put, it is nice to make your acquaintance, Senpai!
And I look forward to learning from you, Professor Nakamori!
Please teach me lots and lots over the next two years...
More like four times that amount.
I will be under your tutelage for that amount of time!
He just whispered something!
Or rather, he is actually all for staying here as long as possible once again?!
Hurry!
Hurry!
Oh, boy...
Unbelievable.
Morita-san...
Hurry!
Hurry!
Someone!
waratta kao ni tsukekomare
Taken advantage of by his smiling face
kuchi ni shita sake ni aorarete, oh
Stimulated by the alcohol she drank
sora misereta toki ururunda face
The tear that wells up when she is shown otherwise
ki ga sukkari sono ki ni natteru
She would already become all for it
atama kakaete
Holding her head
atama kakaete
Holding her head
yume da to omoikonde mo
Even if she tries to pretend that it was a dream
monogataru kare no paper
His paper tells a different story
shiroku samete
Becoming white and discolored
kumo no ue nobori
Ascending above the clouds
gin iro natsu tsunda yoru
The silvery summer's night she was picked up on
shimetsukerareru mistake kienai
She is being constricted by a mistake that will not go away
